short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert EPS files to AI format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to convert EPS to AI?	 

1-Click extension icon - this will open EPS to AI online conversion website. 
2-Select EPS file and click convert button. 
3-You will get your AI file download link in your email address.
